summary: The module defines a collection of matcher functions that examine supplied search parameters and query the Open Library data stores (Infogami, Solr, identifier indexes) to locate existing record keys. Each matcher returns an iterable of matching identifiers, and the functions are ordered in a list to prioritize fast, precise searches such as exact ISBN matches.
business_intent: Enable efficient deduplication and retrieval of existing bibliographic records during data entry or synchronization processes within the Open Library system.
